column4: hey i need help with ffmepg how do i know if i am getting the one from the mediubuntu repository aka the unrestricted one or not

What do you mean?
the startup disk creator is too slow at booting so i want to try another program
Just boot a live cd, insert the usb and partition it as you would any other drive
When you go to install from cd, just choose manual partitioning and select the usb device node, /dev/sdc or whatever in the partitioner
a portable, mobile drive
It would work on as low as 2GB and even much less for some distros
your package manager, with universe repo enabled
